Description.Text: Dhafra Beach Hotel is located in Gharbia Region of the Emirate of Abu Dhabi, 220 kilometres from the city centre and 240 kilometres from Abu Dhabi International Airport. Only minutes from Ruwais Industrial City, the hub of oil and gas industry of Abu Dhabi and a three-hour drive from Dubai.

Falcon Bar: Arabic night club located at the lobby level featuring live band and performance every evening serving variety of beverages and snack menu. Beach Bar: Enjoying the Beach over the sun beds and sipping on the cocktails an ideal place to relax during your off working hours. Mayadeen Restaurant: all day dining restaurant serving international buffet breakfast and dinner as well as ala carte menu the Elaborate buffet display ranges of Asian and continental preparations with special theme. Cafe at the Lobby is a cool venue to relax offering of teas or coffees pastries and cakes during the day and glass of wine in the evening It provides Internet stations and high speed wi-fi internet connection. Hana Bar: Casual and Smart Bar elegantly decorated and with a perfect ambiance for a drink in the evening serving variety of beverages and snacks menu Live Band performance.
